title: 11/18/2020 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 11/18/2020 - Best of The Herd
description:
-Kevin Durant should tell the Nets ownership to trade Kyrie for Harden

-Basketball has a culture issue and its illustrated by this lackluster NBA draft

-Hiring the right coach in the NFL makes winning really easy

-The NFC is wide open with a bunch of good but flawed teams


Guests: Nick Wright, FS1's First Things First

Ric Bucher, FOX Sports NBA Analyst

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
